reviews.review_msg: Very good prof, explains concepts clearly and gives plenty of hints on what to expect on exams. Exams were extremely fair and exam marking was very fair. If you do the tutorials and read the lecture slides and understand the quiz questions you will be fine. Her multiple choice questions are the exact same from the quiz, no tricks ot twists.

Rekkas brushes over topics and doesn't go much in depth. This course becomes stressful as your grade is based solely on midterm (40%) and final (60%). Grind mylab and stay on/above the curve and you should be okay. Tutorials aren't mandatory, and the final was tough. Only had 2 hours to complete 80 MC, (not enough time).
great prof. even if the material isn't that interesting. the tests are long but fair. the workload is less than most courses and she's a good speaker.
